text: Onon, ki guftand: "Alloh taolo hamon Maseh pisari Marjam ast", jaqinan kofir sudand, dar hole ki [xudi] Maseh guft: "Ej Bani Isroil, Allohro ʙiparasted, ki Parvardigori manu Parvadigori sumost. Be tardid, har ki ʙa Alloh taolo sirk ovarad, Alloh taolo ʙihistro ʙar u harom kardaast va cojgohas duzax ast va sitamgoron hec jovare nadorand
